Introduction.Title: Terms and Conditions
Introduction.Description: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of pressure washer services provided by Entretien Pro, including surface cleaning, fleet cleaning, and graffiti removal.

ServiceUsage.Title: Use of Services
Description: Services are provided in accordance with specified terms and must not be used for any unlawful purposes.
Customers are responsible for ensuring that any information provided to Entretien Pro is accurate and complete.

PaymentAndPricing.Title: Payment and Pricing
Description: Prices for services will be as quoted at the time of booking.
Payment for services must be completed in accordance with the agreed terms.

CancellationPolicy.Title: Cancellation Policy
Description: Cancellations must be made within a specified period prior to the service date to avoid charges.
In the event of a late cancellation, a cancellation fee may apply.

LiabilityLimitations.Title: Limitations of Liability
Description: Entretien Pro is not liable for any indirect or consequential losses due to service use.
Liability for any damages shall not exceed the amount paid for the service.

WarrantyDisclaimer.Title: Warranty Disclaimer
WarrantyDisclaimer.Description: Services are provided 'as is' without any warranties, either expressed or implied, to the fullest extent permissible pursuant to applicable law.

IntellectualProperty.Title: Intellectual Property
IntellectualProperty.Description: All intellectual property rights related to the services provided are and shall remain the property of Entretien Pro.

GoverningLaw.Title: Governing Law
GoverningLaw.Description: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Canada.

AmendmentPolicy.Title: Amendment Policy
AmendmentPolicy.Description: Entretien Pro reserves the right to amend these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of the services following any changes signifies acceptance of those changes.

ContactInformation.Title: Contact Information
ContactInformation.Description: For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please email us at: entretien@vhpro.ca.
